item.title: Deep pothole opposite telegraph pole DP100 on Greenway Lane about 50metres from A46 junction, 5th May
item.description:
Deep pothole opposite telegraph pole DP100 on Greenway Lane about 50metres from A46 junction before entrance to nurseries. There is also a broken carriageway edge due to water damage 3 metres away

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greenway Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Several potholes in this location, 5th May
item.description:
Between North hill house & Green gables are several holes. Also outside Glan Nant house, next door to Green Gables. These have been filled in previous years & are reoccurring annually, so most enduring solution is to resurface this section of road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parton Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.title: Recently resurfaced road has a cast iron inspection cover left approx 75mm below adjacent finished road level., 4th May

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A436, Shipton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Red light still out 3 months after report, 4th May
item.description:
The red light at the junction northbound from Gloucester Business Park onto the Bar wood Bypass is STILL not working. There was a report 3 months ago on this, plus I had previously rang this in as an emergency as it is a red light not working. Have just seen a car almost drive through the junction as a result, and therefore the light needs fixing asap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working
